name: Basin Finance
description: Basin DAO is proud to introduce BAI, a groundbreaking stablecoin deployed on Base Mainnet As the first overcollateralized Collateralized Debt Position (CDP) stablecoin on Base, BAI is designed to address key challenges in the existing stablecoin market by implementing a robust and secure framework. By leveraging overcollateralization, Basin DAO has ensured enhanced stability and security for BAI, positioning it as a reliable asset in the rapidly evolving crypto landscape.
